title: About MedGuide
subtitle: Your AI-Powered Medical Assistant
description: MedGuide is an innovative healthcare platform that combines artificial intelligence with medical expertise to provide personalized health insights, report analysis, and medical recommendations.

aiAnalysis.title: AI-Powered Analysis
aiAnalysis.description: Advanced AI algorithms analyze your medical reports and provide detailed insights.

reportUpload.title: Report Upload
reportUpload.description: Upload and securely store your medical reports for comprehensive analysis.

chatAssistant.title: AI Chat Assistant
chatAssistant.description: Get instant answers to your health questions from our AI medical assistant.

clinicFinder.title: Clinic Finder
clinicFinder.description: Find nearby medical clinics and healthcare providers based on your location.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.description: Available in English and Tamil for better accessibility.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To democratize healthcare by making advanced medical AI accessible to everyone, regardless of their location or background.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where everyone has access to intelligent healthcare guidance and personalized medical insights.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Built by a team of healthcare professionals, AI researchers, and software engineers passionate about improving healthcare outcomes.

technology.title: Technology
technology.description: Powered by cutting-edge AI technologies including natural language processing, computer vision, and machine learning algorithms.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.description: Your health data is encrypted and secure. We follow strict privacy protocols to protect your personal information.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.address: Address: 123 Healthcare St, Medical City, MC 12345
